intro.name: invest/intro
intro.title: Invest
intro.headline: Investing is central to our Active Wealth approach—and to your financial well-being.
intro.text: When faced with volatility, you may feel compelled to sell assets in the hope of stemming your losses. But being out of the market for even a short time can significantly reduce the long-term value of your portfolio.
intro.bgImageAlt: Wide overhead shot of several windmills on a hilltop extending into the distance with a mountain range in the background.

question.name: invest/question/1
question.text: Do you feel you understand your current investment strategy?

question.name: invest/question/2
question.text: Are your investments consistent with your overall risk appetite?

question.name: invest/question/3
question.text: Does your advisor offer sustainability and social impact investment guidance?

intro.name: borrow/intro
intro.title: Borrow
intro.headline: Now, let’s look at your appetite for borrowing.
intro.text: Strategic borrowing can help achieve long-term investment goals. While borrowing is often seen as a money or debt decision, in reality, it can be part of a smart investment strategy.
intro.bgImageAlt: Overhead drone shot of white sailboats sailing through the open seas during the day.

question.name: borrow/question/1
question.text: Do you use debt as an active component of your financial plan?

question.name: borrow/question/2
question.text: Would you consider using debt to finance a large purchase?

interstitial.source: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System (US), 2019
Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System (US), 2019

question.name: borrow/question/3
question.text: Do you currently have an investment credit line as part of your overall wealth strategy?

intro.name: spend/intro
intro.title: Spend
intro.headline: Let's talk about spending.
intro.text: Small changes in spending can have a significant impact on wealth. A dynamic spending strategy can help ensure you make the most of your wealth—and your life.
intro.bgImageAlt: Architectural detail of interior wood inlay.

question.name: spend/question/1
question.text: Is having a spend strategy for your overall investment plan important to you?

interstitial.content: Small changes in spending can have a significant impact on wealth.
interstitial.text1: For example, increasing spending by just

question.name: spend/question/2
question.text: Do you know what your spending represents as a percentage of your total assets?

question.name: spend/question/3
question.text: Do you adjust your spending to reflect economic, market and life changes?

intro.name: manage/intro
intro.title: Manage
intro.headline: Let's talk about managing your wealth.
intro.text: Managing and mitigating the cost of federal, state and local taxes on income, estates, capital gains and property are critical to maximizing wealth—and ensuring the overall wellness of your portfolio.
intro.bgImageAlt: Wide drone shot of a bird’s eye view of colorful rooftops in geometric blocks.

question.name: manage/question/1
question.text: Do you understand how taxes and costs can impact the growth of your portfolio?

question.name: manage/question/2
question.text: Does your advisor provide solutions that minimize taxes in your portfolio?

question.name: manage/question/3
question.text: Are you maximizing the value of your charitable gifts?

intro.name: protect/intro
intro.title: Protect
intro.headline: Let’s evaluate how you are protecting your assets.
intro.text: For more than 200 years, we've safeguarded the wealth of some of the most successful individuals and families around the world, helping them protect what matters most—their legacy. And we can do the same for you.
intro.bgImageAlt: Overhead drone shot of foggy, lush, green treetops.

question.name: protect/question/1
question.text: Do you have an estate plan?

interstitial.text2: of families lose their wealth by the second generation and
interstitial.text3: in the third. Having an estate plan can help you leave behind a legacy that matters.

interstitial.text2: of families lose their wealth by the second generation and
interstitial.text3: in the third. Having an estate plan can help you leave behind a legacy that matters.

question.name: protect/question/2
question.text: Are you maximizing transfer/gifting strategies to reduce your taxable estate?

question.name: protect/question/3
question.text: Do you have a strategy to pass on your assets after death?
